message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm willing to part with it for $16,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but my price reflects the true value of this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $13,000?
